verses.verse: Ye shall make <S%H6213><s%> you no <S%H3808><s%> idols <S%H457><s%> nor graven image, <S%H6459><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> rear you up <S%H6965><s%> a standing image, <S%H4676><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye set up <S%H5414><s%> any image <S%H4906><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> to bow down <S%H7812><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> it: for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
Ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> my sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and reverence <S%H3372><s%> my sanctuary: <S%H4720><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> ye walk <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them;

Then I will give <S%H5414><s%> you rain <S%H1653><s%> in due season, <S%H6256><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> her increase, <S%H2981><s%> and the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> their fruit. <S%H6529><s%>

And your threshing <S%H1786><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the vintage, <S%H1210><s%> and the vintage <S%H1210><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the sowing time: <S%H2233><s%> and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full, <S%H7648><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> safely. <S%H983><s%>

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and ye shall lie down, <S%H7901><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> shall make you afraid: <S%H2729><s%> and I will rid <S%H7673><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the sword <S%H2719><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> through your land. <S%H776><s%>
And ye shall chase <S%H7291><s%> <S%H853><s%> your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And five <S%H2568><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> a hundred, <S%H3967><s%> and a hundred <S%H3967><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you shall put ten thousand to flight: <S%H7291><s%> <S%H7233><s%> and your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

For I will have respect <S%H6437><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, and make you fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> <S%H853><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you, and establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you.
And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> old store, <S%H3465><s%> <S%H3462><s%> and bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the old <S%H3465><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the new. <S%H2319><s%>
And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you: and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> abhor <S%H1602><s%> you.
And I will walk <S%H1980><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, and will be <S%H1961><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and ye <S%H859><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> my people. <S%H5971><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that ye should not be <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1961><s%> their bondmen; <S%H5650><s%> and I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the bands <S%H4133><s%> of your yoke, <S%H5923><s%> and made you go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H853><s%> upright. <S%H6968><s%>
But if <S%H518><s%> ye will not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me, and will not <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> commandments; <S%H4687><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> ye shall despise <S%H3988><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> or if <S%H518><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%> abhor <S%H1602><s%> <S%H853><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> so that ye will not <S%H1115><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> but that ye break <S%H6565><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant: <S%H1285><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> also <S%H637><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> unto you; I will even appoint <S%H6485><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you terror, <S%H928><s%> <S%H853><s%> consumption, <S%H7829><s%> and the burning ague, <S%H6920><s%> that shall consume <S%H3615><s%> the eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and cause sorrow <S%H1727><s%> of heart: <S%H5315><s%> and ye shall sow <S%H2232><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> in vain, <S%H7385><s%> for your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> it.

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against you, and ye shall be slain <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies: <S%H341><s%> they that hate <S%H8130><s%> you shall reign <S%H7287><s%> over you; and ye shall flee <S%H5127><s%> when none <S%H369><s%> pursueth <S%H7291><s%> you.

And if <S%H518><s%> ye will not <S%H3808><s%> yet for <S%H5704><s%> all this <S%H428><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me, then I will punish <S%H3256><s%> you seven times <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> your sins. <S%H2403><s%>

And I will break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H853><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of your power; <S%H5797><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> your heaven <S%H8064><s%> as iron, <S%H1270><s%> and your earth <S%H776><s%> as brass: <S%H5154><s%>

And your strength <S%H3581><s%> shall be spent <S%H8552><s%> in vain: <S%H7385><s%> for your land <S%H776><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> her increase, <S%H2981><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> their fruits. <S%H6529><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> ye walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> me, and will <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me; I will bring seven times more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H7651><s%> plagues <S%H4347><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you according to your sins. <S%H2403><s%>

I will also send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> wild <S%H7704><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> among you, which shall rob you of your children, <S%H7921><s%> <S%H853><s%> and destroy <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> your cattle, <S%H929><s%> and make you few in number; <S%H4591><s%> <S%H853><s%> and your high ways <S%H1870><s%> shall be desolate. <S%H8074><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> ye will not <S%H3808><s%> be reformed <S%H3256><s%> by me by these things, <S%H428><s%> but will walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> me;

Then will I <S%H589><s%> also <S%H637><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> you, and will punish <S%H5221><s%> you yet <S%H1571><s%> seven times <S%H7651><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> your sins. <S%H2403><s%>

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, that shall avenge <S%H5358><s%> the quarrel <S%H5359><s%> of my covenant: <S%H1285><s%> and when ye are gathered together <S%H622><s%> within <S%H413><s%> your cities, <S%H5892><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you; and ye shall be delivered <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy. <S%H341><s%>

And when I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of your bread, <S%H3899><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> women <S%H802><s%> shall bake <S%H644><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> oven, <S%H8574><s%> and they shall deliver you your bread again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H3899><s%> by weight: <S%H4948><s%> and ye shall eat, <S%H398><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> ye will not <S%H3808><s%> for all this <S%H2063><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me, but walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> me;

Then I will walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> you also in fury; <S%H2534><s%> and I, even <S%H637><s%> I, <S%H589><s%> will chastise <S%H3256><s%> you seven times <S%H7651><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> your sins. <S%H2403><s%>
And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall ye eat. <S%H398><s%>

And I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H853><s%> your high places, <S%H1116><s%> and cut down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> your images, <S%H2553><s%> and cast <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> your carcasses <S%H6297><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the carcasses <S%H6297><s%> of your idols, <S%H1544><s%> and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall abhor <S%H1602><s%> you.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> your cities <S%H5892><s%> waste, <S%H2723><s%> and bring your sanctuaries unto desolation, <S%H8074><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4720><s%> and I will not <S%H3808><s%> smell <S%H7306><s%> the savor <S%H7381><s%> of your sweet odors. <S%H5207><s%>

And I <S%H589><s%> will bring the land into desolation: <S%H8074><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H776><s%> and your enemies <S%H341><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> it.

And I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> you among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and will draw out <S%H7324><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you: and your land <S%H776><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> and your cities <S%H5892><s%> waste. <S%H2723><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shall the land <S%H776><s%> enjoy <S%H7521><s%> <S%H853><s%> her sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> as long as <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> it lieth desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and ye <S%H859><s%> be in your enemies' <S%H341><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> even then <S%H227><s%> shall the land <S%H776><s%> rest, <S%H7673><s%> and enjoy <S%H7521><s%> <S%H853><s%> her sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%>

As long as <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> it lieth desolate <S%H8074><s%> it shall rest; <S%H7673><s%> <S%H853><s%> because <S%H834><s%> it did not <S%H3808><s%> rest <S%H7673><s%> in your sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> when ye dwelt <S%H3427><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it.

And upon them that are left <S%H7604><s%> alive of you I will send <S%H935><s%> a faintness <S%H4816><s%> into their hearts <S%H3824><s%> in the lands <S%H776><s%> of their enemies; <S%H341><s%> and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a shaken <S%H5086><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%> shall chase <S%H7291><s%> them; and they shall flee, <S%H5127><s%> as fleeing <S%H4499><s%> from a sword; <S%H2719><s%> and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> when none <S%H369><s%> pursueth. <S%H7291><s%>

And they shall fall <S%H3782><s%> one <S%H376><s%> upon another, <S%H251><s%> as it were before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> a sword, <S%H2719><s%> when none <S%H369><s%> pursueth: <S%H7291><s%> and ye shall have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> power to stand <S%H8617><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies. <S%H341><s%>
And ye shall perish <S%H6><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall eat you up. <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%>

And they that are left <S%H7604><s%> of you shall pine away <S%H4743><s%> in their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> in your enemies' <S%H341><s%> lands; <S%H776><s%> and also <S%H637><s%> in the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> shall they pine away <S%H4743><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them.

If they shall confess <S%H3034><s%> <S%H853><s%> their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> with their trespass <S%H4604><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me, and that <S%H834><s%> also <S%H637><s%> they have walked <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> me;

And that I <S%H589><s%> also <S%H637><s%> have walked <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> them, and have brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies; <S%H341><s%> if <S%H176><s%> then <S%H227><s%> their uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> hearts <S%H3824><s%> be humbled, <S%H3665><s%> and they then <S%H227><s%> accept <S%H7521><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the punishment of their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%>

Then will I remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and also <S%H637><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and also <S%H637><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Abraham <S%H85><s%> will I remember; <S%H2142><s%> and I will remember <S%H2142><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

The land <S%H776><s%> also shall be left <S%H5800><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them, and shall enjoy <S%H7521><s%> <S%H853><s%> her sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> while she lieth desolate <S%H8074><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> them: and they <S%H1992><s%> shall accept <S%H7521><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the punishment of their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> because, <S%H3282><s%> even because <S%H3282><s%> they despised <S%H3988><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and because their soul <S%H5315><s%> abhorred <S%H1602><s%> my statutes. <S%H2708><s%>

And yet <S%H637><s%> for all that, <S%H1571><s%> <S%H2063><s%> when they be <S%H1961><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies, <S%H341><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> cast them away, <S%H3988><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I abhor <S%H1602><s%> them, to destroy them utterly, <S%H3615><s%> and to break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them: for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

But I will for their sakes remember <S%H2142><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of their ancestors, <S%H7223><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> that I might be <S%H1961><s%> their God: <S%H430><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> and laws, <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> between <S%H996><s%> him and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
